name: Ah Yam Wot Ah Yam
description:
You are the Weapon! Yes you are. Play as Thamuel the Garlic and go save lady Aaliin from the vampire Count Hiram.

Controls:

[U] Restart the game

[Escape] Pause the game

[A], [Left Arrow] Move to the left/Go to the previous page

[D], [Right Arrow] Move to the Right/Go to the previous page

[Space] Action button

How to play:

When you fight Hiram you have no way to attack him. Wait for him to get tired then when he's about to consume Aaliin's blood jump on her with [Space] and let him bite you instead as You are the Weapon - a garlic - destroyer of vampires.
